attributes.action: Stop commercial flights to the UK from the Countries most effected by Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: It makes absolutlely no sense to ask the people of Britain to self isolate, and take social distancing measures, and then continue to allow thousands of people into this Country from COVID-19 hotspots who are not being tested or quarantined.
attributes.background: Stop flights from the above countries entering the UK for a period of three months.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
